accorrdion_button_text_open: View all items in the order
accorrdion_button_text_close: Collapse all items in the order
extra_data_asafta: • Pickup is available upon completion of Lupa's production at Lupa's lockers located at: 4 Haim Shapira St, 2nd floor, hall 8, New Industrial Area, Rishon LeZion. • Access is available from 5:00 a.m. to midnight (00:00), seven days a week. Enter the building with your car via a concrete gate with the sign 'Beit Masof Building' and drive to the rooftop to 'Papyrus Printing'. Sound the horn to open the entrance barrier. • The delivery is managed by SMS and/or email, so ensure the order includes an accurate email address and a valid mobile phone number. • Once you receive the SMS or email, the Lupa will be available for pickup for up to 36 hours. • Large quantities or combined orders where the weight and/or package size is exceptional will prevent pickup.
extra_data_bhshops: • The delivery is managed by SMS and/or email, so ensure the order includes an accurate email address and a valid mobile phone number. • Distribution service to hundreds of stores nationwide with wide availability. • Pickup is available according to the business hours of the selected store. • If the delivery point is full, an SMS or email will be sent for alternative point selection, which may delay the Lupa's delivery. • Once you receive the SMS or email, the Lupa will be available for up to 14 business days at the store. • Weight and package size restrictions apply (which may vary from time to time). If the order exceeds this limit, this shipping method cannot be used, and the customer will have to choose another shipping option or Lupa's customer service will reach out for shipping replacement. • Delivery areas are restricted according to the courier company's policy. • Shipping abroad is not available.
extra_data_registered: • The delivery is managed by SMS, so ensure the order includes a valid mobile phone number. • Delivery times for registered mail are defined by Israel Post, typically fulfilled within 10 business days, but without a clear commitment on their part. • Weight and package size restrictions apply (which may vary from time to time). If the order exceeds this limit, this shipping method cannot be used, and the customer will have to choose another shipping option or Lupa's customer service will reach out for shipping replacement. • Packages for registered mail are shipped according to Israel Post's delivery areas. • The order is not delivered to the specified address but must be picked up from the designated distribution point or post office, as per Israel Post instructions. • Shipping abroad is not available.
extra_data_bhhome: • The delivery is managed by SMS and/or email, so ensure the order includes an accurate email address and a valid mobile phone number. • The customer’s presence at home is not required. If the customer is not available when the courier arrives, the product will be left near the front door, electrical cabinet, or another agreed-upon location, accompanied by a phone update or notification via email/SMS. • For large quantities or combined orders, shipping cost may vary if weight and/or package size is exceptional. • Delivery areas are restricted according to the courier company's policy. • Shipping abroad is not available.
collection_bucket_button: I have a bulk order code
collection_bucket_error_message: The coupon you entered is not suitable here. You can try re-entering it in the coupon code field below.
personal_details_collection_bucket_messa: Hold on, we need your phone number to update you on the order:
